label: DocumentLineDocument
comment: A collection of data for a line on a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the category assigned by the buyer for this document line.
A code specifying a category for this cross-border regulatory procedure, such as the appendices of the CITES Convention.
The code specifying the status of this document line.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value for the latest revision of this document line.
The unique identifier of a line in this referenced document.
A reason, expressed as text, for the line status in this document line.
The code specifying the line status reason for this document line.
The unique identifier of the parent line to this document line.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the publication of this document line.
A code specifying a response reason for this exchanged document.
An identifier of a subordinate line of this document line.
The universally unique identifier (UUID) of this document line.

objectProperties.comment: The period within which this document line is effective.
A note included for this document status.
The acknowledgement document referenced in this document line.
A document referenced by this acknowledgement document.

referencedBy.comment: A document line associated with this line trade settlement.
A document line associated with this line trade settlement.
A document line associated with this line trade settlement.
